text: The Ballad of Mona Lisa (shortened as Mona Lisa) is the lead single off the Panic! at the Disco album Vices & Virtues released on February 1, 2011 under Fueled By Ramen. The single was produced by Butch Walker and John Feldmann and written by band members frontman Brendon Urie and drummer Spencer Smith. The song peaked at number 84 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 single's chart. The song has received positive critical reviews upon its release. ==Track listing== ==Charts== Charts (2011) Peak position US Billboard Hot 100 89 US Alternative Songs (Billboard) 24 US Rock Songs (Billboard) 50 ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:Panic! at the Disco songs
title: The Ballad of Mona Lisa
